title: Nordstrom’s Fall Sale Has Landed — Here Are The 24 Best Fashion Finds
description: Fall is the perfect time to rethink your style direction. After all, the change in temperature calls for a switch in fabrics, silhouettes, and even mood. It’s also an opportunity to stock up on wardrobe must-haves or experiment with a trend you’ve been eyeing, especially with all the seasonal sales. One of the most anticipated ones is Nordstrom’s. The retailer recently rolled out its Fall Sale, and it’s brimming with the best runway-approved fashion trends, including knee-high boots, metallic sneakers, and cardigans — all up to 60% off.There's truly no time like the present to round out your seasonal wardrobe with these discounted items. If, however, you're feeling overwhelmed by the deluge of quickly-selling pieces, don't worry: We’re here to help. Ahead, we've compiled the best Nordstrom deals across women’s fashion — from Refinery29 reader-favorite brands like Free People, Good American, Petal & Pup, and more — that we think are worth adding to your cart ASAP, before the sale ends on October 28.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.25% off Free People Hailee Turtleneck Sweater & SkirtShop NordstromFree People Hailee Turtleneck Sweater & Skirt, $, available at Nordstrom40% off Converse Chuck Taylor All Star 70 Metallic High Top Sneaker Shop NordstromConverse Callie Bootie, $, available at Nordstrom60% off Rebecca Minkoff Amour Leather Top Handle BagShop NordstromRebecca Minkoff Amour Leather Top Handle Bag, $, available at Nordstrom40% off DKNY Transfer Stitch SweaterShop NordstromDKNY Transfer Stitch Sweater, $, available at Nordstrom41% off Franco Sarto Katherine Knee High Boot Shop NordstromFranco Sarto Katherine Knee High Boot, $, available at Nordstrom25% off Good American Good '90s Suiting Pleated Wide Leg PantsShop NordstromGood American Good '90s Suiting Pleated Wide Leg Pants, $, available at Nordstrom30% off Vince Iliana Slingback Pointed Toe Flat Shop NordstromVince Iliana Slingback Pointed Toe Flat, $, available at Nordstrom25% off Wayf Lila Crystal Tie CardiganShop NordstromWayf Lila Crystal Tie Cardigan, $, available at Nordstrom20% off Adore Me Tiana Unlined Balconette BraShop NordstromAdore Me Tiana Unlined Balconette Bra, $, available at Nordstrom33% off Nordstrom Madyson Mary Jane Pump Shop NordstromNordstrom Madyson Mary Jane Pump, $, available at Nordstrom25% off BP. author: Victoria Montalti
excerpt: Take up to 60% off clothing, shoes, and handbags during Nordstrom’s Fall Sale. Shop discounted fashion from now until October 28.

html:
Photo: Courtesy of Nordstrom.

Fall is the perfect time to rethink your style direction. After all, the change in temperature calls for a switch in fabrics, silhouettes, and even mood. It’s also an opportunity to stock up on wardrobe must-haves or experiment with a trend you’ve been eyeing, especially with all the seasonal sales. 

There's truly no time like the present to round out your seasonal wardrobe with these discounted items. If, however, you're feeling overwhelmed by the deluge of quickly-selling pieces, don't worry: We’re here to help. Ahead, we've compiled the best Nordstrom deals across women’s fashion — from Refinery29 reader-favorite brands like Free People, Good American, Petal & Pup, and more — that we think are worth adding to your cart ASAP, before the sale ends on October 28.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.
